# Curse of Ill Fortune (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Blackguard Spells|Blackguard 2]], [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Target:** One living creature

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 56

*Letting loose a stream of foul incantations, you curse the subject.*

You place a temporary curse upon the subject, giving it a â€“3 penalty on attack rolls, saving throws, ability checks, and skill checks. *Curse of ill fortune* is negated by any spell that removes a *[[Bestow Curse (Spell)|bestow curse]]* spell.
